  • Field Details

    • PROXY_ADDRESS

      public static final Setting.AffixSetting<java.lang.String> PROXY_ADDRESS
      The remote address for the proxy. The connections will be opened to the configured address.

    • REMOTE_SOCKET_CONNECTIONS

      public static final Setting.AffixSetting<java.lang.Integer> REMOTE_SOCKET_CONNECTIONS
      The maximum number of socket connections that will be established to a remote cluster. The default is 18.

    • SERVER_NAME

      public static final Setting.AffixSetting<java.lang.String> SERVER_NAME
      A configurable server_name attribute
